english.segment1: I dont know the time of day. That you could come to rearrange my everything. It only takes a second with you. To overturn what Ive been going through
english.segment2: You know all about me. All there is to know about. Even the darkest parts that I hide. I cant pull the wool over your eyes. You see straight through me, all the way through me
english.segment3: Everything I hide is shown. When youre around to expose my everything. It only takes a second with you. To overturn what Ive been going through
english.segment4: . Everything is in your hands. Nothing is out of your control. You alone are high and lifted up. You alone. Are high and lifted up
